data.meta_description: #SelfiesForUkraine! I stand with Bill Kleyman üá∫üá¶ and the Ukraine. We took 9 selfies together today at #PTC23. Bill donated $20 for my first selfie, I matched‚Ä¶ | 11 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
Another #prouddad moment I have to share. My daughter, Nina Ann N., is living her best life entertaining people all over the world through her music. She has 1.3B views and two platinum singles as a song writer making her in the top 2% of songwriters per Muso.AI. Amazing! Best of all, she loves what she does. üòä Keep up the good work kiddo! Summary ‚úÖ 1.3B Views (TikTok & YouTube Shorts) ‚úÖ 240M Streams (Spotify, YouTube, SoundCloud) ‚úÖ 353,000 Identifies (Shazam) ‚úÖ 193,000 Videos (TikTok & YouTube Shorts) Songs ‚úÖ +1 KPOP = 2 x Platinum >200M streams/ea ‚úÖ +4 Citizen Queen = 10 x Silver >1M streams/ea ‚úÖ +11 Songs = 39 x Bronze >100k streams/ea ‚úÖ +5 Songs = 21 x Iron >10k streams/ea See her real time credits, stats and collaborators on Muso.AI! üëâ Muso.AI: https://lnkd.in/g236g3qT #entertainment #music #future #socialmedia #socialnetworking #management #kpop #songwriting | Citizen Queen, LLC | Jane kim | JYP Entertainment | Angela S. Huang | Kaedi D. | Republic Records | Synematik MusicWorld LLC | Gabi Grella | RCA Records | Sony Music Entertainment | Nik Aji | Jay Sehmbey | Air Studio | Nine Media Corporation | Ria Tanjuatco Trillo | The Kraze | EnVi Media | Teri Klug CDCMP¬Æ | Bill Kleyman üá∫üá¶

Erik Riedel passed away suddenly on June 30, 2024. He was 52. My heart goes out to his family, especially his wife and four kids, his friends and colleagues. I just wanted to share this picture as it shows Erik's BIG personality perfectly. We were two geeks who loved to dig into compute hardware and keep expanding the underpinnings of the internet. He contributed to the Open Compute Project Foundation, ITRenew, Iron Mountain, Dell Technologies, Seagate Technology, SNIA and so many more. He always came ready to debate AND collaborate. He was smart as a whip and eternally curious. We could butt heads and still go have a beer when we were done. I really appreciated that about Erik. He will be missed. Memorial: https://lnkd.in/gQf5enD2 #technology #innovation #cloud #baremetal #itad #sesame #easyedge #sustainability | Cato Digital | Ali Fenn | Sayles Braga | Aidin Aghamiri | Jim Weinheimer | Valentin G. | Jojo Gregorio | Joe Reele | Robert Bunger | James Simonelli | iMasons Climate Accord

Cato Digital DGX GPU servers are on their way! Low cost, low carbon compute for continuous #SmallLanguageModel training, #inference, #genai image and video generation and simultaneous #ChatGPT sessions all running concurrently on these powerful dedicated servers. 128GB to 512GB of combined VRAM per machine. Check out our NVIDIA DGX servers at http://cato.ai! You also visit Yuval Bachar and I at the Cato deployment at the ECL data center in Mountian View CA! Schedule a visit! ‚úÖ Cato: https://cato.ai ‚úÖ ECL: https://ecldc.com ‚úÖ ECL MV1 DC: https://lnkd.in/g9vzsnmi #technology #innovation #generativeAI #slm #llm #inference #chatgpt #baremetal #datacenter #digitalinfrastructure | NVIDIA | Yuval Bachar | Stelia | Tobias Hooton | Dan Scarbrough | Jesse Fulton | Valentin G. | Simon Allen | Peter Gross, PE | Dave Johnson | Amber Caramella | Bill Kleyman üá∫üá¶ | Uri Soroka | Mahdi Yahya | Jonathan L. | Gary Negus | Nader Khalil | Alan Butler | Robert Dugdale | Greg Osuri | Anil Murty | Travis Cannell | Yann Leger | Chetan Venkatesh | Zachary Smith | Jacob Smith | Oliver Jones | Christian Belady | James Barrese | Hugh Carspecken | | Rob Johnson | Chris Dolan | Jeremy Rodriguez | Wade Vinson | Matthew Hull | Ingemar Lanevi

This week we celebrate Santiago Suinaga's official start as Infrastructure Masons CEO. The board and I are excited for him to take the helm and lead iMasons to the next level. Our community‚Äôs role in driving the global growth of #digitalinfrastructure has never been as important as it is today. I encourage iMasons members, leaders and partners to reach out to Santiago to welcome him and share your ideas on how we can compound the impact of our work across #education #inclusion #sustainability and #innovation. Lets go! üëç #technology #future #business #generativeai #ai #datacenters #power #people #perception #planet #netzero #cleanenergyzone #imwomen #climateaccord | Miranda G. Gardiner, LEED Fellow | Rudolf Gordon-Seymour | Rachell Robson | Emma Stevens | Courtney Popp, M.A., PMP | Bill Kleyman üá∫üá¶ | Dame Dawn Childs DBE FREng | Inge Woudstra | Amber Caramella | Heather Dooley | Donna Lorenzen | Mara Ervin | Rhea Williams | Suzanne O. | Claudia Massey | Cyre Mercedes Denny | Lee Kirby | Alison Marlow | Mike Eytle | Tony Grayson | Christopher Stapakis | Valeriya Chulyukina | Lindsay McConville | Elizabeth Raven | Eboni Haynes | Romain Tranchant | Lovisa Hagelberg | Patricia Rodr√≠guez Henr√≠quez | Annika Svensson | Johnson Agogbua | Prakhar Sharma | Dave Wildman | Robert Dugdale | Nancy Novak | Ashley Wills, RCDD, OSP, DCDC, PMP | Connor McLellan | Agostinho Villela |

I believe #innovation requires #disruption. Today we shatter many #digitalinfrastructure assumptions with the ECL announcement of their first AI Factory #datacenter with Cato Digital as the first customer. ‚úÖ Off-Grid ‚úÖ Hydrogen Powered ‚úÖ No Generators ‚úÖ No UPS ‚úÖ < 1 WUE (Water positive) ‚úÖ < 1.1 PUE ‚úÖ Second-Life NVIDIA DGX ‚úÖ 50kW/Rack ‚úÖ < 12 Months Yuval Bachar asked me to join the ECL board the day the iMasons Climate Accord was born at Christian Belady‚Äôs home on April 22, 2022. When I heard his audacious plan I was all-in! Today we announce one of the most sustainable data centers in the world driving net-zero carbon across materials, equipment and power. üåø Press Release: https://lnkd.in/gChw9Vn9 üåø First Cato Server: https://lnkd.in/gHSiRdNZ üåø Cato GPUs: https://cato.ai üåø Chez Belady: https://lnkd.in/g3R6WVNX üåø Climate Accord: https://climateaccord.org #technology #sustianabiity #hydrogen #microgrid | Infrastructure Masons | Amber Caramella | Peter Gross, PE | Dave Johnson | Jesse Fulton | Karimulla Shaikh | Valentin G. | Jojo Gregorio | Mark Dickerson | Greg L. | Breanne Koncurat | Brandon Gillespie | Lyle Mantooth | Jake Wood | McKell Christensen | Simon Allen | Reed Anderson | Corbin Casper | Robert Dugdale

There are moments in life when you just need to stop and appreciate all that is happening. I saw this at the Manchester Piccadilly train station after I got back from London today. My daughter Nina Ann N. is in Burlesque The Musical opening at the Manchester Opera House Thursday night! So proud of you kiddo. You continue to amaze me with your talent and drive. Can‚Äôt wait to see you light that stage up! üíï üî• Musical: https://lnkd.in/gzvRaiqw üî• Cast: https://lnkd.in/gTJFRQjg üî• Creatives: https://lnkd.in/gTiY8hxa #socialmedia #music #entertainment #theater #future | Citizen Queen, LLC | Angela S. Huang | Ally Taylor | Viral Nation | Sony Pictures Entertainment | Screen Gems Productions | Loren Long | Sarah Peterson | Simon Allen | Mark Thiele

Just arrived in Cannes for BroadGroup #datacloud! This place is gorgeous! Can‚Äôt wait for the festivities to start. We have a very exciting Infrastructure Masons‚Äô announcement this week! The entire iMasons board is here to support the launch of the next phase of our global community! Stay tuned. üòé #technology #innovation #future #business #digitalinfrastructure #education #inclusion #sustainability | Jeff Omelchuck | Rudolf Gordon-Seymour | Rachell Robson | Emma Stevens | Miranda G. I‚Äôm on my way to Austin to participate in Overclock Labs, creators of Akash Network accelerator conference. Of course I had to bring my newly branded Cato Digital carry on. üòé Excited to engage with Greg Osuri, Anil Murty, Cheng Wang and entire Akash community as we all drive the future of #GenerativeAI.
